verses.verse: וְעָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> Then wrought בְצַלְאֵ֨ל <WH1212> Bezaleel וְאָהֳלִיאָ֜ב <WH171> and Aholiab וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and every אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man חֲכַם־ <WH2450> and every wise לֵ֗ב <WH3820> hearted אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> put יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD חָכְמָ֤ה <WH2451> wisdom וּתְבוּנָה֙ <WH8394> and understanding בָּהֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> in whom לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> to know לַעֲשֹׂ֔ת <WH6213> how to work אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> all manner of work עֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> for the service הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary לְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> had commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> according to all that the LORD

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּצַלְאֵל֮ <WH1212> Bezaleel וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אָֽהֳלִיאָב֒ <WH171> and Aholiab וְאֶל֙ <WH413> and כָּל־ <WH3605> every אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man חֲכַם־ <WH2450> and every wise לֵ֔ב <WH3820> hearted אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> had put יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD חָכְמָ֖ה <WH2451> wisdom בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> in whose heart כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> everyone אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whose נְשָׂא֣וֹ <WH5375> stirred him up לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> [even] every one whose heart לְקָרְבָ֥ה <WH7126> to come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> unto the work לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> to do אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> And they received מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> of מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> Moses אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתְּרוּמָה֙ <WH8641> all the offering אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הֵבִ֜יאוּ <WH935> had brought בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לִמְלֶ֛אכֶת <WH4399> for the work עֲבֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> of the service הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary לַעֲשֹׂ֣ת <WH6213> to make אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> וְ֠הֵם <WH1992> like הֵבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> it [withal] And they brought אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> and ע֛וֹד <WH5750> still נְדָבָ֖ה <WH5071> yet unto him free offerings בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> every morning בַּבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> morning

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> came כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַ֣חֲכָמִ֔ים <WH2450> And all the wise men הָעֹשִׂ֕ים <WH6213> that wrought אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> all the work הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> every man אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> each מִמְּלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <WH4399> from his work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> which they made

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they spake אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מַרְבִּ֥ים <WH7235> much more הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> The people לְהָבִ֑יא <WH935> bring מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> than enough הָֽעֲבֹדָה֙ <WH5656> for the service לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> of the work אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> to make אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> gave commandment מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיַּעֲבִ֨ירוּ <WH5674> was circulated ק֥וֹל <WH6963> proclamation בַּֽמַּחֲנֶה֮ <WH4264> throughout the camp לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Let neither man וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> nor woman אַל־ <WH408> no יַעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> make ע֛וֹד <WH5750> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> any more work לִתְרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> for the offering הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וַיִּכָּלֵ֥א <WH3607> were restrained הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> So the people מֵהָבִֽיא׃ <WH935> from bringing

וְהַמְּלָאכָ֗ה <WH4399> For the stuff הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> had דַיָּ֛ם <WH1767> they had was sufficient לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> for all the work לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to make אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> וְהוֹתֵֽר׃ <WH3498> it and too much ס

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> among them that wrought כָל־ <WH3605> All חֲכַם־ <WH2450> And every wise לֵ֜ב <WH3820> hearted man בְּעֹשֵׂ֧י <WH6213> made הַמְּלָאכָ֛ה <WH4399> the work אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten יְרִיעֹ֑ת <WH3407> curtains שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <WH7806> [of] fine twined וּתְכֵ֤לֶת <WH8504> and blue וְאַרְגָּמָן֙ <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֣עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֔י <WH8144> and scarlet כְּרֻבִ֛ים <WH3742> [with] cherubims מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> work חֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH2803> of cunning עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> made אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

אֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָֽאַחַ֗ת <WH259> of one שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> and eight וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> [was] twenty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> and the breadth אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> four בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits הַיְרִיעָ֖ה <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> of one מִדָּ֥ה <WH4060> size אַחַ֖ת <WH259> [were] all of one לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַיְרִיעֹֽת׃ <WH3407> the curtains

וַיְחַבֵּר֙ <WH2266> And he coupled אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> the five הַיְרִיעֹ֔ת <WH3407> curtains אַחַ֖ת <WH259> one אֶל־ <WH413> and אֶחָ֑ת <WH376> he וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and [the other] five יְרִיעֹת֙ <WH3407> curtains חִבַּ֔ר <WH2266> he coupled אַחַ֖ת <WH259> unto another אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶחָֽת׃ <WH376> He

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made לֻֽלְאֹ֣ת <WH3924> loops תְּכֵ֗לֶת <WH8504> of blue עַ֣ל <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֤ת <WH8193> on the edge הַיְרִיעָה֙ <WH3407> curtain הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> of one מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> from the selvedge בַּמַּחְבָּ֑רֶת <WH4225> in the coupling כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> likewise עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> likewise he made בִּשְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> side הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of [another] curtain הַקִּ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <WH7020> in the uttermost בַּמַּחְבֶּ֖רֶת <WH4225> in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> of the second

חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> Fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops עָשָׂה֮ <WH6213> made בַּיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָת֒ <WH259> he in one וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> made בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> he in the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of the curtain אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after בַּמַּחְבֶּ֣רֶת <WH4225> which [was] in the coupling הַשֵּׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> of the second מַקְבִּילֹת֙ <WH6901> held הַלֻּ֣לָאֹ֔ת <WH3924> the loops אַחַ֖ת <WH259> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> [curtain] to another

וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> fifty קַרְסֵ֣י <WH7165> taches זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וַיְחַבֵּ֨ר <WH2266> and coupled אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְרִעֹ֜ת <WH3407> the curtains אַחַ֤ת <WH259> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אַחַת֙ <WH259> unto another בַּקְּרָסִ֔ים <WH7165> with the taches וַֽיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> tabernacle אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> so it became one ס

וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <WH6213> And he made יְרִיעֹ֣ת <WH3407> curtains עִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> [of] goats' לְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> [hair] for the tent עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> over the tabernacle עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten יְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> curtains עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> he made אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

אֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> The length הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָאַחַ֗ת <WH259> of one שְׁלֹשִׁים֙ <WH7970> [was] thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> and four אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits רֹ֖חַב <WH7341> [was] the breadth הַיְרִיעָ֣ה <WH3407> curtain הָאֶחָ֑ת <WH259> of one מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> size אַחַ֔ת <WH259> [were] of one לְעַשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten יְרִיעֹֽת׃ <WH3407> curtains

וַיְחַבֵּ֛ר <WH2266> And he coupled אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> curtains לְבָ֑ד <WH905> themselves וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> by themselves and six הַיְרִיעֹ֖ת <WH3407> curtains לְבָֽד׃ <WH905> themselves

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made לֻֽלָאֹ֣ת <WH3924> loops חֲמִשִּׁ֗ים <WH2572> fifty עַ֚ל <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of the curtain הַקִּיצֹנָ֖ה <WH7020> upon the uttermost בַּמַּחְבָּ֑רֶת <WH4225> in the coupling וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> and fifty לֻלָאֹ֗ת <WH3924> loops עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> made עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> he upon the edge הַיְרִיעָ֔ה <WH3407> of the curtain הַחֹבֶ֖רֶת <WH2279> which coupleth הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> the second

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made קַרְסֵ֥י <WH7165> taches נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> [of] brass חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <WH2572> fifty לְחַבֵּ֥ר <WH2266> together אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> the tent לִהְיֹ֥ת <WH1961> become אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> that it might be one

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made מִכְסֶה֙ <WH4372> a covering לָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> for the tent עֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins אֵלִ֖ים <WH352> [of] rams' מְאָדָּמִ֑ים <WH119> dyed red וּמִכְסֵ֛ה <WH4372> and a covering עֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> [of] badgers' מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> above ס

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH7175> boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> for the tabernacle עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <WH7848> [of] shittim עֹמְדִֽים׃ <WH5975> standing up

עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> [was] ten אַמֹּ֖ת <WH520> cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> The length הַקָּ֑רֶשׁ <WH7175> of a board וְאַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubit וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and a half הָֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits רֹ֖חַב <WH7341> and the breadth הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> of a board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> had two יָדֹ֗ת <WH3027> tenons לַקֶּ֙רֶשׁ֙ <WH7175> board הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> One מְשֻׁלָּבֹ֔ת <WH7947> equally distant אַחַ֖ת <WH259> one אֶל־ <WH413> from אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> another כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> thus עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> thus did he make לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> for all קַרְשֵׁ֥י <WH7175> for all the boards הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> of the tabernacle

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּרָשִׁ֖ים <WH7175> boards לַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> for the tabernacle עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty קְרָשִׁ֔ים <WH7175> boards לִפְאַ֖ת <WH6285> side נֶ֥גֶב <WH5045> for the south תֵּימָֽנָה׃ <WH8486> southward

וְאַרְבָּעִים֙ <WH705> And forty אַדְנֵי־ <WH134> sockets כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> of silver עָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> he made תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> under the twenty הַקְּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH7175> boards שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> two אֲדָנִ֜ים <WH134> sockets תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֤רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָד֙ <WH259> under one לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> for his two יְדֹתָ֔יו <WH3027> tenons וּשְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> and two אֲדָנִ֛ים <WH134> sockets תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> under another לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> for his two יְדֹתָֽיו׃ <WH3027> tenons

וּלְצֶ֧לַע <WH6763> side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> And for the other לִפְאַ֣ת <WH6285> corner צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> [which is] toward the north עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> he made עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty קְרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH7175> boards

וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> And their forty אַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> sockets כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two אֲדָנִ֗ים <WH134> sockets תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֣רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> under one וּשְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> and two אֲדָנִ֔ים <WH134> sockets תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַקֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH7175> board הָאֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> under another
וּֽלְיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> And for the sides הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> westward עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> he made שִׁשָּׁ֥ה <WH8337> six קְרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH7175> boards

וּשְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> And two קְרָשִׁים֙ <WH7175> boards עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> made לִמְקֻצְעֹ֖ת <WH4742> he for the corners הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle בַּיַּרְכָתָֽיִם׃ <WH3411> in the two sides
